issues.replacement: 3D immersive environment or "walking into a book" experience

issues.replacement: Non-linear, multi-modal simultaneous creation

issues.replacement: Generous spacing with golden ratio proportions and breathing room

issues.replacement: 3D depth and spatial layering with sacred geometry
